AT.name: Mighty Bomb Jack™
AT.description: Der Dämon Belzebut hat die königliche Familie in der Großen Pyramide des Bösen eingekerkert. Jetzt ist es Zeit für Jack, dem einzig verbliebenen freien Erben, sie zu retten. Als Mighty Bomb Jack ist es deine Aufgabe, durch tückische Gänge und feindverseuchte Räume zu springen und zu gleiten und dabei fleißig Bomben und Schätze einzusammeln. Jack kann seine Fähigkeiten durch das Aufsammeln von Mighty-Münzen verbessern, aber werde bloß nicht gierig, oder du findest dich unversehens in der Schreckenskammer wieder! Wenn du diesen Titel bereits auf deiner Wii™ erworben hast, führe einen System-Transfer von deiner Wii auf deine Wii U™ durch, um ein Upgrade-Sonderangebot zu erhalten. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Mighty Bomb Jack™
AU.description: When the royal family is imprisoned inside the Great Pyramid of Evil by the demon Belzebut, it's up to Jack, the only remaining heir, to rescue them. As Mighty Bomb Jack you must jump and glide through treacherous corridors and enemy-infested rooms, collecting bombs and treasures as you go. Jack can increase his abilities by collecting Mighty Coins - but don't be greedy or you'll be sent to the Torture Room! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: Mighty Bomb Jack™
BG.description: When the royal family is imprisoned inside the Great Pyramid of Evil by the demon Belzebut, it's up to Jack, the only remaining heir, to rescue them. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Mighty Bomb Jack™
BE.description: Lorsque le démoniaque Belzebut enlève et enferme la famille royale dans sa pyramide maudite, seul Jack, le dernier héritier restant, peut leur venir en aide. Vous incarnez Mighty Bomb Jack. Il vous faudra sauter et vous frayer un chemin à travers des couloirs truffés de pièges et des salles remplies d'ennemis tout en ramassant des bombes et des trésors. Collectez les superpièces pour améliorer les aptitudes de Jack, mais ne soyez pas trop gourmand ou Jack sera envoyé dans la salle de torture ! Si vous possédez ce titre sur votre Wii, faites un transfert Wii™ vers votre Wii U™ afin d'obtenir la version améliorée à un prix spécial ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

ES.name: Mighty Bomb Jack™
ES.description: El futuro de la familia real se encuentra en manos de su único heredero, Jack, cuando el demonio Bezebut encierra a su familia en la Gran Pirámide del Mal. Mighty Bomb Jack deberá saltar y deslizarse por pasadizos llenos de trampas y salas infestadas de enemigos, mientras recoge bombas y tesoros que encontrará en su camino. Jack puede aumentar sus habilidades con las monedas Mighty, pero no te dejes llevar por la avaricia ¡o acabarás en la Sala de Torturas! Si posees este título en tu Wii™, puedes realizar una transferencia de datos de Wii a Wii U™ y obtener una actualización a un precio especial. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

IT.name: Mighty Bomb Jack™
IT.description: Il demone Belzebut ha imprigionato la famiglia reale all'interno della grande Piramide del male! Nei panni di Jack, l'ultimo erede, solo tu puoi salvare i tuoi cari! Salta e plana nei meandri della piramide, attraversando corridoi e stanze infestati dai nemici e raccogliendo tutte le bombe e i tesori che trovi sul tuo cammino. Raccogli le monete Mighty per potenziare le tue abilità, ma non farti prendere dall'avarizia... o finirai nella Stanza delle torture! Se possiedi questo titolo sulla tua console Wii™, effettua un trasferimento dati su Wii U™ per potere ottenere la versione ottimizzata a un prezzo speciale! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

NL.name: Mighty Bomb Jack™
NL.description: Wanneer de koninklijke familie door de demon Belzebut gevangen is genomen in de Great Pyramid of Evil, is het aan Jack, de enige overgebleven erfgenaam, om hen te redden. Als Mighty Bomb Jack spring en zweef je je een weg door verraderlijke gangen en kamers vol met vijanden terwijl je bommen en schatten verzamelt. Jack kan zijn vaardigheden verbeteren door Mighty Coins te verzamelen. Maar pas op, als je te hebberig bent, eindig je in de martelkamer! Als je deze titel hebt gekocht op je Wii™, kom je in aanmerking voor een speciale upgrade-prijs als je je gegevens overzet van Wii naar Wii U™. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: Mighty Bomb Jack™
NZ.description: When the royal family is imprisoned inside the Great Pyramid of Evil by the demon Belzebut, it's up to Jack, the only remaining heir, to rescue them. As Mighty Bomb Jack you must jump and glide through treacherous corridors and enemy-infested rooms, collecting bombs and treasures as you go. Jack can increase his abilities by collecting Mighty Coins - but don't be greedy or you'll be sent to the Torture Room! PL.name: Mighty Bomb Jack™
PL.description: When the royal family is imprisoned inside the Great Pyramid of Evil by the demon Belzebut, it's up to Jack, the only remaining heir, to rescue them. As Mighty Bomb Jack you must jump and glide through treacherous corridors and enemy-infested rooms, collecting bombs and treasures as you go. Jack can increase his abilities by collecting Mighty Coins - but don't be greedy or you'll be sent to the Torture Room! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Mighty Bomb Jack™
PT.description: Quando a família real é aprisionada dentro da Great Pyramid of Evil pelo demónio Belzebut, cabe a Jack, o único e derradeiro herdeiro, salvá-los. No papel de Mighty Bomb Jack tens de saltar e deslizar por entre corredores traiçoeiros e salas infestadas de inimigos, recolhendo bombas e tesouros à medida que avanças. Jack pode aumentar as suas capacidades recolhendo Mighty Coins - mas não sejas ganancioso, senão serás enviado para a Torture Room! Caso já tenha adquirido este título para a sua Wii, faça uma transferência de dados da sua Wii™ para a sua Wii U™ com atualizações a um preço especial. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Mighty Bomb Jack™
RU.description: Жестокий демон Belzebut похитил королевскую семью и запер пленников в огромной пирамиде Pyramid of Evil. Jack, единственный наследник, отправляется на помощь родным. Принца Mighty Bomb Jack ожидают длинные мрачные коридоры и смертельные ловушки, просторные залы и полчища врагов, несметные сокровища и тайники с боеприпасами. Чтобы улучшить свои способности, Jack может собирать специальные монеты Mighty Coins, но если он пожадничает и соберет слишком много, он попадет в камеру пыток Torture Room! Если вы приобрели игру на Wii™, вы можете передать ее на консоль Wii U™ и получить скидку на обновление игры до версии Wii U. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.
